name: Legends of Valour
description:
Legends of Valour is a RPG game developed by Synthetic Dimensions. It was originally released in 1992. It was published by Strategic Simulations. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Legends of Valour on Commodore / Amiga, Atari ST and PC.
Nicholas Beliaeff produced the game. Ben Daglish and Martin Walker scored the game.
